body:
As some of you may know, I am being very inactive on Avicus at the moment. Why? Because my computer hard drive failed and I lost everything. Luckily on Monday I will have my new PC and will be back on and more active on server. I have literally just given up on my old PC. 
If you want to know everything about my new computer, just ask :D

title: Sorry for my inactivity.

nice hopefully it will inprove you pvp.
